title: Rotating Gamemode Stuff
body: Hey, anyone know what happened to those 'Rotating gamemode is now live' posts? Like it was super useful to find out what the gamemode for the next few weekends would be.

replies.body: well the next 2 weeks are nexus seige, enjoy

> [{quoted}](name=monkiinator135,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=qeYc6vnA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-23T02:08:01.597+0000)
>
> well the next 2 weeks are nexus seige, enjoy

sigh :c
